name: Break the Cycle (Zultry)
description:
A short platformer about breaking cycles. 

Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 3 - cycles.

Controls

[<][>] (left and Right arrows) : Move

[^] (Up arrow) : Jump

[R] : Restart

[esc] : exit game

Credits

Yuri Gore : Music

Edward Ingle : Programming

Maddie Newland : Art

Liam Ralston : Design
